description: The quilted, 100% recycled synthetic insulation of the Trico Hybrid Vest provides an even distribution of warmth, while a repurposed shell and lining amp up this vest’s sustainability points. All details considered, Trico will become your day-to-day workhorse, whether you’re keeping comfy outdoors, at home, or across the world.
name: Cotopaxi Trico Hybrid Vest - Mens

specs.value: 100% repurposed polyester taffeta with DWR finish and 600 mm PU backer
